roleset.name: bring shame upon
roleset.note: DISHONOUR-V NOTES: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. VNcls amuse-31.1. Comparison to 'dishonor'. (from dishonour.01-v)

example.name: example with both args
example.text: I have dishonoured my name by serving two masters.

roleset.name: refuse to accept
roleset.note: DISHONOUR-V NOTES: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No VNcls. (from dishonour.02-v)

example.name: rejecting item
example.text: The store dishonors checks and drafts.

roleset.name: violate/rape
roleset.note: DISHONOUR-V NOTES: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No VNcls. (from dishonour.03-v)

example.name: example with both args
example.text: Astolfo had dishonoured her even though he was reluctant to marry her.
example.arg: even though he was reluctant to marry her.
